alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:44AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Las Animas and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Banded snow is expected, therefore locally heavy snow is possible causing hazardous travel conditions, including snow covered roads and low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
